author: KareaGhandTrail

game.author: KareaGhandTrail
game.name: block_assault
game.short_description: A first person shooter game with multiple features
game.title: CS:MT (BlockAssault)

long_description:
# Bots for BlockAssault.
This is a mod that adds bots to the game, for training.

Bots has:

1. Many favorite weapons

2. Path finder

3. Who to kill

4. His own currency (to dont conflict with **bs_bank**)

5. Hunter

6. Advanced movements system

7. His own PvB engine (to dont conflict with **bs_pvp_engine**)

8. His Match core (to dont conflict with **bs_core:match_core**)

9. His own bullet mechanism

Overrides:

* Match core **(bs_core)**

* PvP Engine

* BAS helpers

* BAS core functions

Please report any issue/crash from this mod in issues!
name: bs_bots
short_description: Add bots to your game for training
title: CSMT Bots (Obsolete)
